"Slain": "So, you're the new Meteorn they've been talkin' about, eh?"
"I knew you'd come here. I see everything that goes on."
"But it's still a bit early for us to meet. Come and see me again after you've grown accustomed to things around here."
"My name is Slain, the ARKS Gunslash Instructor. Folks around here call me the Bulletspeed Bladestorm."
"And you're here because... Ah, yes... our souls resonated."
"I can feel it. Your soul is calling out desperately for the power of a Slayer."
"I can lead you on that path. It'll require intense training, of course."
"Will you carve my teachings, deeply into your soul...?"
"I'm sure it'd be a trifling task for someone like you. Don't disappoint me, now."
"I will always be waiting. Come see me again when you can feel your soul's resonance."
"You might just be able to surpass my speed one day. I look forward to it."
"Stay true to your heart and refine your soul."
